data.question: What is the highest water contact angle reported for the MOFFs?
Which MOFF has the highest BET surface area based on nitrogen adsorption isotherms?
What method was used to retain the terminal MeOH and H2O groups in MOFF-1 and MOFF-3, respectively?
data.answer: MOFF-1 was air-dried, and MOFF-3 was SCD-dried.

data.question: Which MOFF shows a change in hydrophobicity after oven-drying?

Which MOFF has the lowest decomposition temperature based on TGA traces?
Is the BET surface area of MOFF-3 available from nitrogen adsorption isotherm?
Do MOFFs 1–3 adsorb significant amounts of water at 90% relative humidity?
What is the role of DABCO in the structure of MOFF-2?
data.answer: It acts as a pillaring ligand.

data.question: Are MOFFs 1–3 considered superhydrophobic?
What is the empirical formula of MOFF-3?
What technique was used for water vapor adsorption measurements?
data.answer: Micromeritics ASAP 2020 Surface Area and Porosity Analyzer

data.question: Does MOFF-2 show a higher thermal stability compared to MOFF-1?
What is the crystal system of MOFF-1?
Can the synthesis of MOFFs involve solvothermal conditions?

data.answer: It is used as a metal source.
